name: Hentai Mod
authors: Translated by Pedy, Authors: Tamariba No Hentai&Volunteers, Refluffed by yours truly
description: Did you ever want to have a more *intimate* kind of relationship with your favorite characters?  What about getting molested by lewd creatures?  This mod will not make the first dream come true, we have a mod for that, but it will sure make the second wish true.
